problem.problem_statement: What can farmers do to protect bees?
problem.goalTitle: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns

problem.problem_statement: How can we better manage freshwater in dry areas?
problem.goalTitle: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development

problem.problem_statement: How can we prevent wildfires and stop them quickly?
problem.goalTitle: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts

problem.problem_statement: How do forests help control the amount of carbon dioxide in the air?
problem.goalTitle: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts

problem.problem_statement: What can we do to attract more different kinds of bees to our farms to grow better crops?
problem.goalTitle: End hunger, achieve food security and improved nutrition and promote sustainable agriculture

problem.problem_statement: How can we reduce plastic pollution in oceans?
problem.goalTitle: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development

problem.problem_statement: How can we use natural methods to manage floods?
problem.goalTitle: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
